sections.heading: Encumbrances; referee; appointment; report; appeal
sections.text: If deemed advisable, the court may appoint a referee to inquire into the nature and amount of encumbrances, and report accordingly. From that report an appeal lies to the court.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 820, p. 539;R.S.1913, ยง 8303;C.S.1922, ยง 9255;C.S
